page.title: 20Future plans for Clevedon
page.content: In the year 1985 it is expected that the new shopping precinct will be built. The plans were submitted to the people of Clevedon who voted upon the one most suited to their needs and the final decision was given by the Town Council. The contract was given to Tarmac Ltd. It is proposed to extend the road from the motorway to form an inner ring road and the car park which is on the northern edge of this area will form part of the shopping area. There will be a large supermarket with a pedestrian walkway and the river will be landscaped into a feature of the garden.
